short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator to easily generate QR Code for the URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is made to
Generate QR code for the current webpage you are currently viewing. Just click on the extension to generate QR code and you could even save it.

Also this extension runs offline that means you can create QR code images of any text or URL without being connection to internet.

A privacy friendly QR code generator extension, which doesn't sent your data to any services.

The code for the extension is made available in GitHub, you could access it in the link https://github.com/dashokkumar93/Chrome-extension-QR-Code-Generator if you have any queries please let us know in 



How to use it 

1. Just click on the extension to generate the QR code for the current webpage you are using it.

2. One could even download the QR code and share it with anyone whom they want.

Uses of the extension

1. For webpages of long url its tedious to open a link in phone now just scan the qr code generated from the extension in your phone to open it in the phone
